Business Purpose: Identifies distinct customer groups based on purchase behavior to enable targeted marketing strategies
Skills Demonstrated: Machine Learning | Customer Analytics | K-Means Clustering | Data Standardization
Detailed Notes: Uses wine customer offer data to perform unsupervised learning clustering. Applies the elbow method to determine optimal number of customer segments. Scales data to ensure fair comparison across variables. Business value: Enables personalized marketing campaigns and customer targeting.

Business Purpose: Analyzes how customer distance from physical stores impacts online revenue
Skills Demonstrated: Predictive Analytics | Linear Regression | Statistical Modeling
Detailed Notes: Builds a linear model showing the relationship between online revenue (YTD) and distance from nearest store. Provides equation to predict behavior. Business value: Informs store location strategy and online/offline channel allocation.

Business Purpose: Demonstrates ability to pull real-time data from external APIs for analysis
Skills Demonstrated: API Integration | Data Extraction | REST APIs
Detailed Notes: Connects to NHL's official API to retrieve current team information. Shows capability to integrate external data sources into business intelligence workflows. Business value: Foundation for automated data pipelines and live reporting.

Business Purpose: Examines relationships between customer website behavior and purchase outcomes
Skills Demonstrated: Exploratory Data Analysis | Correlation Analysis | Data Visualization
Detailed Notes: Analyzes key e-commerce metrics: time on site, pages visited, items in cart, and basket value. Creates visual pairplots to identify patterns. Calculates multiple correlations to understand what drives conversions. Business value: Identifies which website behaviors lead to higher sales.

Business Purpose: Identifies unusual data points that could indicate issues or opportunities
Skills Demonstrated: Data Quality | Statistical Analysis | Outlier Detection | Z-Score & IQR Methods
Detailed Notes: Uses two statistical methods (Z-Score and IQR) to flag outliers across all numeric fields. Outputs results to separate Excel sheets for review. Business value: Catches data errors, fraud, or exceptional cases that need investigation.

Business Purpose: Calculates number of distinct users in dataset for audience sizing
Skills Demonstrated: Data Aggregation | User Analytics | Distinct Count Operations
Detailed Notes: Quick analysis to count unique users in a dataset. Foundation skill for calculating market size, active users, or customer base. Business value: Answers fundamental 'how many customers' questions.

Business Purpose: Saves API data locally for analysis and archiving
Skills Demonstrated: API Integration | JSON Data Handling | Data Extraction
Detailed Notes: Pulls NHL teams data from API and saves as JSON file for local analysis. Demonstrates data collection and storage for offline processing. Business value: Creates data archives and enables batch processing workflows.

Business Purpose: Connects to Microsoft Access databases to extract business data
Skills Demonstrated: Database Connectivity | SQL Queries | Legacy System Integration
Detailed Notes: Uses ODBC to connect to Access databases and query tables. Important for organizations with existing Access-based systems. Business value: Integrates legacy data sources into modern analytics workflows.

Business Purpose: Calculates AUC score to measure predictive model accuracy
Skills Demonstrated: Machine Learning Evaluation | ROC-AUC | Model Validation
Detailed Notes: Computes Area Under the Curve (AUC) metric to assess classification model performance. Shows understanding of model quality metrics. Business value: Validates that predictive models are reliable before deployment.

Business Purpose: Automatically calculates correlations between all variables in a dataset
Skills Demonstrated: Statistical Analysis | Correlation Matrix | Automated Analysis
Detailed Notes: Systematically tests relationships between all pairs of columns in dataset. Produces complete correlation report. Business value: Quickly identifies which factors are related without manual testing.

Business Purpose: Finds the most common value in each dataset column
Skills Demonstrated: Descriptive Statistics | Data Summarization
Detailed Notes: Calculates mode (most frequent value) across all columns in Excel data. Part of standard statistical profiling. Business value: Identifies typical customer profiles or most common scenarios.

File Name: Pull the Game details working xy.py
Business Purpose: Extracts coordinate data from NHL game events and exports to Excel
Skills Demonstrated: API Integration | JSON Parsing | Data Structuring | Excel Export
Detailed Notes: Connects to NHL game API, parses complex nested JSON data, extracts event coordinates (X/Y positions), and structures into Excel format. Business value: Shows ability to transform unstructured API data into analysis-ready formats.

Business Purpose: Collects historical sports data across multiple dates with smart rate limiting
Skills Demonstrated: Web Scraping | Date Range Processing | Automated Data Collection
Detailed Notes: Loops through date ranges to scrape NHL game data systematically. Includes random delays to avoid overwhelming servers (ethical scraping). Business value: Automates data collection that would otherwise require manual effort.
